author: heinz.gassner
title: Presenting auf Deutsch !
description: Growing the Cardano ecosystem and Cardano opportunities within German industry requires localized presentation- and training material

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal identifies the problem with the need for localized presentation and training material about Cardano in German. The proposal clearly articulates how the solution presented will add value to the Cardano ecosystem. The proposer presents key metrics and goals that make it possible to assess the success of the proposal. The proposal does not present any plan as to whether it will be sustainable in the future.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer has attached links from its members' Linkedin enabling the evaluation of the experience mentioned in the proposal. The proposal presents a detailed budget that appears reasonable to achieve the proposed goals. The proposal has a realistic timeframe for implementing the proposal. The proposer presents a conductible plan for implementation that shows what will be done and how. The proposal does not pose greater risks for its implementation. The resources needed to implement the proposal are described.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal presents a clear explanation of the problem and the proposed solution. It also features a roadmap with milestones and a time horizon for achievement. Metrics and KPIs are presented to assess the success of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0:
The problem needing to be solved has been identified and articulated namely that  there is no proper localized presentation- and training material   for industry for DLT learning and training in industry. It is clear that this proposal falls within the scope of the challenge brief by creating localized presentation- and training material. 
This proposal shows clearly how it adds value to the Cardano system as it would create a modular DLT/Blockchain presentation & training framework German industrialists and workers. This presentation kit can be used at all levels of industry. Key metrics are clear, reasonable and realistic. THese include the building of the  presentation kit ie Consulting Artifact.The key metrics and goals of the proposal fall within the scope of the challenge. The list of metrics and KPIs is comprehensive and well laid out.Proposal can scale to address future challenges by further developing and fine tuning the Presentation kit as well as building industry specific presentations. This project will have a positive impact on Cardano system by increasing the awareness and trust  among German Industry and global industry thereafter.
I feel that this project adequately addresses the challenge hence i have given it a 4 star rating.


If this does not receive funding for whatever reason, one way proposer can improve it is by continuing to build and send press releases to media of your country or social media relating to your subject. Sometimes that one step might motivate someone to view the link and add credibility for your project and give him a better idea on the project which enables him to vote for the project. 

You can also look more into developing a contingency plan if for any reason your original plan does not work out. This planning is very favorable when CAs and voters consider proposals since more often than not, what we think will happen wont happen but some complication or issue will arise.

I am qualified to write this assessment based on being a translator since 1992 at the State Broadcasting Corporation as well as since that time,running my own translation agency, working with the two native languages of my country as well as working on various translation projects into other languages, including translation, transcription and proofreading.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposers have   provided evidence  of themselves with their skills and experience in Consulting and Research. The Linkedin Profiles of Core leadership has been provided. The links are sufficient. I have visited the links. The proposer is competent to build this content. The proposal   has given details of other team members. He has provided the team structure of members and their capabilities and other partners who he would work with such as experts, developers etc. The budget has  been outlined clearly and broken down into identifiable items. Clear costs have been given for the various hosting fees on platforms and marketing campaign costs as well as podcast apps.   The budget is  not reasonable to achieve the set goals.  The costs are higher than I feel are reasonable. For example 100 USD per hour for domain experts and seems somewhat high to be reasonable. 

Labor cost for project management has been taken as 50 USD per hour which is high even by Western standards. A Labor cost of 30 USD is more reasonable.  
The proposer has not provided a verifiable plan if additional funding is required  
There is no plan for additional funding  if objectives are not met. 
The timetable is realstic to build the tools and related research.
The proposal  provides  a sensible and conductible plan for implementation. It has a very practical plan with detailed breakdown in terms of the various stages of development of the tool.  Resources  necessary to implement the proposal are described. 
The proposal has technical aspects which have been addressed The proposer has not identified risks in this proposal . Given experience and plan presented it is likely this proposal will be implemented successfully hence I have given it a 4 star rating.
 
A piece of advice... You can also look more into developing a contingency plan if for any reason your original plan does not work out. This planning is very favorable when CAs and voters consider proposals since more often than not, what we think will happen wont happen but some complication or issue will arise. A proposer who has considered this, would be looked on more favorably since it shows that they are prepared for various situations and eventualities
f6_assessments.q2:
There is a clear roadmap with milestones and a time horizon for achievement. There are  clearly defined Metrics/KPIs that define the success of the proposal. These include KPIs upto March 2022 as releasing design and content, collaborations and experts in place, quality check for content, integration, creation of presentation modules and quality checking by experts from April to June 2022. 
There is a clear understandable description of the targeted problem and a detailed path to solve the problem. 
The proposer has not identified possible hurdles, challenges and difficulties. 
The information provided is sufficient to audit the progress and the success of the proposal hence I have given it a 4 star rating.


Nonetheless one piece of advice for the proposer.  Make as many metrics which you can track easily. Use Trello or Notion or some similar project management tool.

f6_assessments.q0: There are increasing amount of people become aware of Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies, while not all of it are positive and only a small minority of people aware of DLT (Distributed Ledger Transaction) or blockchain impact. This proposal aims to create a multilingual resource platform for German community, providing a modular DLT/Blockchain presentation & training framework for industry.
f6_assessments.q1: This is a well written proposal, by including the Business Model Canvas, we could understand how they work, their value, achievements, goals, target demographic, and everything revolving around their business model. This proposal provides a clear information for the team, by including their Linkedin profile. Their team consist of people from different field, some expert and some students from university. The budget have broken down into specific roles and this proves that the proposer able to identify their team needs. This proposal is a DLT 360 project that are working together with people from universities and academia, with the guidance from DLT 360 core team. In term of feasibility, consider that this proposer have already got a funding from Fund 6 to form this DLT 360 team. So there is a high chance that they will continue their work with this proposal and make it a success.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal able to provide the roadmap, complete with description and target. KPIs is well defined and can be audited and track the progress. However, they mentioned that a detailed documentation will be available through MIRO, yet I don't see any reference link to those. The website that they mention can't be accessed by the time of this writing. Hopefully it will be soon available after the funding, so this project can be tracked for their progress.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal sets out a clear problem and in adequacy with the criteria of the challenge, in the sense that its solution aims at Growing the Cardano ecosystem and Cardano opportunities in the German-speaking. This stuck with the indices provided in the KPIs, in particular KPIs 4 and 5, which also coincides with those of the challenge. Its positive impact for the community is clearly identified and conscious, in particular in the fact of Contributing to creating new business opportunities for the Cardano ecosystem, and of Translating DLT / Blockchain talk into manufacturing-industry language.
f6_assessments.q1: All the participants and their skills are very well detailed, links are provided as well as a site. The budget is clear, coherent, very well detailed, with short and long term objectives and a well detailed plan. The timeline is coherent and realistic and the technical aspects are precise. I didn´t see any indication of the risks, but all the information provides presents an awareness and an in-depth reflection of the project which still gives all the clues necessary for the feasibility of this proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: The roadmap is precise, detailed, as well as the KPIs make sense and use quantitative criteria measurable by the community. It is stated in various ways in which the team plans to communicate the progress of this project to the community. The fact that several paragraphs are written for the benefit of the CA is a favorable point for the transparency of this project. In addition the following information: "Our Business Model Canvas section outlined below contains major activities, milestones, deliverables, roadmap and costs "And" We offer on-demand visits to these MIRO boards "shows their attention to communication with the ecosystem as well as the possibility of following them with their Website / GitHub.

solution: We utilize the knowledge of our team for establishing a modular DLT/Blockchain presentation & training framework for industry
experience: More than 30 years of industry-leadership experience combined with direct access to relevant German-speaking expertise
